Description: Green glazed composition figure of a hippopotamus, decorated on the back with lotus patterns in black
Curator's comments: Published: PM I Part 2, p. 614. Bourriau, Pharaohs and Mortals, [111].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1977 London, BM, Animals in Art 1990 20 Oct-9 Dec, Japan, Tokyo, Setagaya Art Museum, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.87 1991 5 Jan-20 Feb, Japan, Yamaguchi, Prefectural Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.87 1991 9 Mar-7 May, Japan, Osaka, National Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.87
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
